subject: Use of Stone Matrix Asphatt (SMA) against asphatt concrete as wearing course.
text: #Trf4 <cfy <TTHI qfearut RMI9 /Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (M Wart, 73r 4ar7t & TrHf HATT4) 554 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 AT # National Highways Authority of India RTT: 'Extn = 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) Tt-5 W 6, #qrr-10, &RTT, # faari-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn: 14th December 2009 POLICY MATTERS Tech: (38/2009) (Decision taken in FNo.NHAl/Tech/TIC/Gen/2009) Sub: Use of Stone Matrix Asphalt (SMA) against asphalt concrete as wearing course. Stone Matrix Asphalt (SMA) was developed in Germany in the mid 1960s and it has been used successfully by many countries in the world as highly rut-resistant bituminous course, both for binder (intermediate) and wearing courses, for heavy traffic roads. Indian Road Congress has already issued tentative specitications for Stone Matrix Asphalt vide IRC; SP: 79-2008_ Ministry of Road Transport & Highways is also in the process of issuing  specifications for Stone Matrix   Asphalt in the Sth revision of Specifications for the Road and Bridge works. 2 It has been decided that Stone Matrix Asphalt may be used as a wearing course against asphalt concrete in all the future NHAI projects. Accordingly, provision for SMA may be made in the bid documents. 3 This issues with the approval of Chairman: k V_Y (K.
